GSD.description:
drm/amd/pm: fix double free in si_parse_power_table()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit a5ce7051db044290b1a95045ff03c249005a3aa4. For more details please see the references link.
